name: Hardware Tycoon 2018
description:
Create Hardware & Compete!

Hardware Tycoon is a game about creating Hardware and compete with other companies while progressing through tech history, and at the same time avoiding going bankrupt.

Game is still under development and there isn't much content as of right now.

Hardware Tycoon Discord

Known Issues:

-Trees might sometimes overlap objects incorrectly

-You can’t Quit nor Fullscreen the game. (This is a browser issue.)

- Sometimes when a Competitor creates a CPU the ID for it gets assigned incorrectly, this causes the CPU to show up places where it shouldn't. It will be fixed when i redo the AI.
